I purchased four different colors of this set.  I love the “put together” look when I go out during the day. The fabric is soft and on the thin side, not like typical sweatshirt fabric.  The pieces are short seamed, so be prepared to make repairs.  The pants are comfortable with nice wide legs. The top is a nice length with a crew neckline.  I prefer a v-neck; I think that is a more flattering look.  The pants come in only one length.  I am 5’ tall and had to cut off about 4” and still hem them with a 1” hem.  Overall, they are good for daily running around.  I expect they will last a season.  I probably won’t reorder them.
